transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji, good afternoon sir. Sonia bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ji, aapne sir ek mujhe bheji thi kuch details ek buylead ki like ki inse aapki baat hui hai aur inhone bola ki just net surf kar rahe the ye, right?
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Sir aapne us lead pe saari cheeze check ki? Unhone kya bola aap se saaf-saaf?
Customer: Party ne?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ye uska to ye kehna hai main net surf kar raha tha isme moringa powder ka. Jaise pata nahi lead kaise ban gayi. To ye aksar rehta hai.
Executive: Sir ye hota hoga. Maximum cases mein yehi hota hai. Haan, ye yaha pe ek cheez to pehle aap sir is buylead ko dekhiye proper. Agar is buylead mein ye hota na ki sirf koi bhi detail nahi di hoti, properly har ek cheez mentioned hai. Quantity mentioned hai, kis form mein chahiye ye mention hai, grade mention hai, purity mention hai, order value mention hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To sir har ek cheez mentioned hai. Jab tak koi bhi buyer ye proper form mein fill karke nahi deta buylead aise nahi banti hai. Haan buylead net surfing ki bhi banti hai, wo kis basis pe banti hai agar wo ek hamara sir timeline hota hai ki 2 minute, 3 minute. Thik hai, exact mujhe idea nahi hai ki agar wo itne time tak aapki profile ko search out kar raha hai ya IndiaMART pe scroll kar raha hai pure time pe, do-teen baar scroll kar raha hai. To that means sir usko kuch na kuch to chahiye IndiaMART se. Right? Tab wo surfing ki lead banti hai. Ab jaise suppose that sir hum ek mall mein bhi jaate hai na kuch kharidte hai to hum idhar udhar dekhte hai to sale mein salesman humse aake puch hi leta hai ki sir aapko kya chahiye? Hai na? To ek is tarike se sir wo lead ban jaati hai shopping wali but inki sir surfing wali lead nahi hai. Inki properly mentioned lead hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Inhone saari cheeze mention kari hai aur ye log jhooth bolte hai.
Customer: To ye.
Executive: Because inke paas sir, because sir inke paas char-paanch logo ke calls aate hai. Minimum paanch logo ke calls jaate hi jaate hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai? Inhone ye saara form bhar ke diya to paanch call ye gaye honge. Iske baad agar inhone kisi ke pe direct inquiry kari hogi to unke bhi call aaye honge inpe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye log irritate ho jaate hai to sirf yehi bol dete hai surf kar raha tha main. Sir surf kar rahe the aap to itni details kaha se aa gayi hamare paas?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar sir hum ye lead banane baithenge fir to hamari company khud hi band ho jayegi.
Customer: Real mein need hai to fir wo mana kyu kar raha hai?
Executive: Sir usko need nahi hai to wo surf kyu kar raha hai? Pura apna form fill karke kyu kar raha hai? Ya to fir wo aise hi faltu ek client baitha hai. Might bhi usko baad mein chahiye ho, price nahi chahiye ho. Ye to sir jhooth bolte hai ye log.
Customer: Bohot saare seller hote hai.
Executive: Haan. Unko kuch. Ya ho sakta hai. Exactly, bohot saare ho sakta hai ki ye khud hi bechte ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan bohot, bohot saare log hote hai jo price ke liye dekh rahe hote hai. Ab aise logo ko to hum kar bhi nahi sakte na. Jaise suppose that sir humne unko call kiya humse wo keh rahe hai ki thik hai, hume ye product chahiye, ye quantity chahiye. Aapne unko call kiya, paanch logo ne call kiya unhone mana kar diya. Hum kya karenge sir tab us case mein bataiye? Us buyer se bhi hum kuch nahi keh sakte. Right?
Customer: Ye nahi ki verified lead.
Executive: Sir verified har ek lead nahi kar sakte hai. Kyunki aap khud sochiye ki agar mahine ki aur saal ki dekhiye millions mein sir generate hoti hai. Matlab 13 crore sir product hai IndiaMART pe, products and services, 13 crore. Hmm. Aur 86 lakh suppliers hai. Hmm. Aur 22 crore ke something buyers hai. To sir socho aap ki 22 crore buyers hai to daily basis pe kitni inquiries, kitna data.
Executive: Har ek lead ko verify karna to possible hi nahi hai. Hmm. Kyunki uske liye alag se puri team bithani padegi. Hamari team hai jo verify karti hai but ek har ek lead nahi ho sakti sir. Har minute mein ek lead aati hai.
Executive: To ye log sir jhooth bolte hai. Mujhe pata hai. Ji.
Customer: Is lead ko kaise verify karoge?
Executive: Is lead ko sir dekho aapne baat ki unhone aap se bol diya ki nahi chahiye. Unhone sir 100% mein likh ke de sakti hu pura form fill up hai. Ek ek cheez fill up hai usme. Inko sir chahiye hoga ab inhone mana kyu kiya mere ko wo to main nahi bata sakti. Ho sakta hai irritate ho gaye ho, ho sakta hai sir pricing ke liye online check kar rahe ho, kisi se inki baat ho gayi ho dealing but wo aapko kyu batayenge? Ye hota hai na har ek insaan ka alag alag mind hota hai. Koi bata deta hai, koi nahi batata hai. To wo wali cheez hai. Hum kuch keh bhi to nahi sakte inse.
Executive: Aisa to sir nahi hai. Ye jhooth bol rahe hai aap se. Ki lead maine sir main net surf kar raha tha. Surf kar rahe honge uske saath saath inke paas form khula hoga. Inhone form pe properly saari cheeze sir mention kari hai.
Customer: Isiliye to isme conversion nahi hota na? Aur kitna kya kya.
Executive: Sir dekho. Sir dekho conversion ki baat aisi hai ki isme aap 10 ki 10 lead to nahi hoti. Main khud is cheez se agree kar rahi hu. 10 pe aap baat karoge to conversion le leke char log baat karenge aap se unme se do hi kharidege. Hum dukaan bhi khol ke baithte hai 10 log aate hai pure din mein aate hai 50 log. 50 ke 50 wo leke nahi jaate sir. Char hi leke jaate hai. To ye bhi IndiaMART ho sir ya koi bhi platform ho IndiaMART ke alawa aap Alibaba le lo, Trade India le lo, any company. Kisi bhi company mein sir aisa hoga hi nahi ki 10 ki 10 lead aapki puri conversion de de.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ye wali cheez hai sir. Hum bhi apna 100% accuracy ka daava to hum bhi nahi karte ki 100% accurate har ek cheez hogi. Wo kar hi nahi sakta, koi bhi nahi kar sakta. Kyunki jo data aata hai wo Google se aata hai. Ab Google pe sir jo bhi log search kar rahe hai, cheeze kar rahe hai ab hum unhe mana ke to nahi kar sakte. Aap khud sochiye. Koi option hi nahi hai ki hum aapke isse wo hum group se ye cheez likh sake ki agar aap koi cheez purchase karoge tabhi aap is profile ko visit kar sakte ho. Nahi kar sakte na sir. Mall mein bhi hum jaate hai cheeze dekh lete hai, nahi kharidte hai. To waisa wala hi sir system hai ye bhi ek hisab se.
Executive: Agar sir aisa hota na ki hum aapko paanch lead de rahe hai, thik hai? Fix de rahe hai paanch lead, bilkul conversion 200% hoga. Fir ye is basis pe thodi sir hum aapko itni lead dete. Fir to aapka ek hum apna commission fix kar lete, commission based kaam karte ki 10 ka sir itna aayega to itna hume chahiye aap itna rakh lo is wajah se.
Customer: Chalo thik hai.
Executive: Haan aur baaki sir aur bhi to leads hai. In dekho sir thoda sa aapko na jo negative cheeze hai unko aapko leave karna padega. Aur bhi jo leads hai unpe karo. 10 mein se sir do ka hi aayega conversion to. Ye wali cheez hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Leads sir aur bhi to hai. Aap consume kyu nahi jaise aapne ye consume kari aur bhi lead kari aapne last week? Kitni lead consume kari hai abhi tak aapne is mahine mein?
Customer: Nahi yehi kari maine.
Executive: Yehi kari thi. Sir aap ek mahine mein aap ek lead consume karke us pe judge karoge pure IndiaMART ko. 30 saal se company chal rahi hai market mein.
Customer: Mera aaj tak ka nahi bohot purana experience hai ye.
Executive: Haan hoga sir aapka experience. Hoga sir aapka experience. Ek hi lead pe koi repeat ho gaya.
Executive: Ek sir ek pe nahi aap kar sakte na. Aap 2015 se ho IndiaMART pe. Aap socho aapne beech mein TrustSeal bhi liya, aapne Maximizer bhi liya tha. To aapko Maximizer mein bhi nahi mila tha kya aapko response sahi?
Customer: Nahi. Nahi.
Executive: Maximizer to hamari kaafi achi service hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Waha bhi sir aapne time nahi diya hoga fir for sure aapne time nahi diya hoga. Hamari guide agar main sahi keh rahi hu to.
Customer: Haan sahi hai.
Executive: Time ka waha bhi hoga ki aap utna time nahi de paate honge. Kitna sir kitna dekhte ho aap IndiaMART ko? Matlab pure din mein kitni baar IndiaMART check kar lete ho aap?
Customer: Char-paanch baar check kar lete hai.
Executive: Char-paanch baar. Fir sir lead kabhi consume kyu nahi hoti? Aisa possible hi nahi hai ki pure month mein aapko lead bhi aisi na mile jo aap consume na kar paaye. Ye to sir possible hi nahi hai kyunki.
Customer: Chalo dekhte hai.
Executive: Mujhe sir ye jaanna hai aap consume kyu nahi karte? Mujhe thoda reason to batao. Ye dekho aap negative ho to us cheez ko thoda sa positive karo aap. Ki business nahi aata. Business nahi aata sir lakho log nahi jude hote abhi tak. Aapke aur aisa nahi main aapke product line ki hi baat kar rahi hu. Aapke product line mein bhi bohot saare log humse jude hue hai. Aur aap se upgraded plan pe aapne bhi Maximizer liya tha aur bhi.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says he was net surfing.

- Customer has not consumed leads.

- Customer says he has not received good responses.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the buylead generation process.

- Executive explained the conversion process.

- Executive explained the importance of time investment.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, conversion, maximizer
